item.title: 3 unrepaired potholes, 3rd April
item.description:
3 potholes have white paint around them, but they were not fixed at the same time as the potholes next door which also had white paint around them. Why not? What 3 Words///inherits.testy.reddish

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
